name: BARONY_ACH_ENTER_THE_DUNGEON
description: Descend to level 1 of the dungeon.

name: BARONY_ACH_TWISTY_PASSAGES
description: Escape the mines.

name: BARONY_ACH_JUNGLE_FEVER
description: Escape the swamp.

name: BARONY_ACH_SANDMAN
description: Escape the sand labyrinth.

name: BARONY_ACH_LICH_HUNTER
description: Find and defeat Baron Herx in his lair.

name: BARONY_ACH_WELL_READ
description: Find and read all of the books.

name: BARONY_ACH_BORN_AGAIN
description: Survive instant death with an amulet of life saving.

name: BARONY_ACH_KING_ARTHURS_BLADE
description: Find King Arthur's mystical sword, Dyrnwyn.

name: BARONY_ACH_SPUD_LORD
description: Find the mystical talking mace, Sharur.

name: BARONY_ACH_THANKS_MR_SKELTAL
description: Find the mystical axe, Parashu.

name: BARONY_ACH_THUNDERGNOME
description: Escape from the Gnomish Mines.

name: BARONY_ACH_THROW_ME_THE_WHIP
description: Get crushed by a boulder.

name: BARONY_ACH_THESEUS_LEGACY
description: Escape from the Minotaur Maze.

name: BARONY_ACH_SPICE_OF_LIFE
description: Start at least one game with every class.

name: BARONY_ACH_SPEAR_OF_DESTINY
description: Find Odin's legendary spear, Gungnir.

name: BARONY_ACH_EVIL_INCARNATE
description: Find and defeat the Baphomet.

name: BARONY_ACH_IN_GREATER_NUMBERS
description: Win the game with at least two players alive.

name: BARONY_ACH_PENNILESS_CONDUCT
description: Win the game without collecting any gold.

name: BARONY_ACH_FOODLESS_CONDUCT
description: Win the game without eating any food.

name: BARONY_ACH_BOOTS_OF_SPEED
description: Defeat Baron Herx or Baphomet in 20 minutes or less.

name: BARONY_ACH_PUZZLE_MASTER
description: Unravel the mystery of Sokoban.

name: BARONY_ACH_ROBBING_THE_CRADLE
description: Loot the Haunted Castle and escape with your life.

name: BARONY_ACH_TRICKS_AND_TRAPS
description: Discover the trap-infested Temple in the swamp.

name: BARONY_ACH_FILTHY_RICH
description: Obtain 10,000 gold.

name: BARONY_ACH_NATURAL_BORN_LEADER
description: Convince at least three NPCs to follow you at once.

name: BARONY_ACH_PROFESSIONAL_BURGLAR
description: Kill at least 3 shopkeepers in one game.

name: BARONY_ACH_HOMICIDAL_MANIAC
description: Kill at least 10 humans in a single game.

name: BARONY_ACH_VEGETARIAN_CONDUCT
description: Win the game without having eaten any tins, meat, or fish.

name: BARONY_ACH_ILLITERATE_CONDUCT
description: Win the game without having read any books, scrolls, or spellbooks.

name: BARONY_ACH_NOT_A_TEAM_PLAYER
description: Kill another player.

name: BARONY_ACH_PLUS_BOOTS_OF_SPEED
description: Reach the final stage in 45 minutes or less and win the game.

name: BARONY_ACH_DESPAIR_CALMS
description: Exit Bram's Castle.

name: BARONY_ACH_CULT_FOLLOWING
description: Exit the Cockatrice's Lair.

name: BARONY_ACH_BRAWLER
description: Attain victory in the Citadel by only attacking with your fists and throwing potions from the beginning of the game.

name: BARONY_ACH_MAGIC_MASTERY
description: Learn 20 Spells.

name: BARONY_ACH_SEE_THAT
description: Kill a monster with a shuriken after it has twice bounced off a wall.

name: BARONY_ACH_GIFTS_ETERNALS
description: Obtain and wear a full set of Artifact Armor.

name: BARONY_ACH_WELL_PREPARED
description: Have 3 Mystic Orb effects active simultaneously.

name: BARONY_ACH_BODYGUARDS
description: Have 2 Dominated Crystal Golems under your leadership.

name: BARONY_ACH_REUNITED
description: Kill a Minotaur after encountering Herx.

name: BARONY_ACH_BLESSED
description: Hold a +10 Weapon.

name: BARONY_ACH_MOVED_ITSELF
description: Kill an ally player with a pushed boulder.

name: BARONY_ACH_GILDED
description: Obtain 100,000 gold.

name: BARONY_ACH_HARDCORE
description: Finish the game from beginning to end with Classic and Hardcore modes on.

name: BARONY_ACH_POST_HARDCORE
description: Finish the game from beginning to end with Hardcore mode on and Classic Mode off.

name: BARONY_ACH_BOMB_SQUAD
description: Successfully disarm 5 Automatons using Lockpicking.

name: BARONY_ACH_SCALES_IN_FAVOR
description: Assassinate a Cockatrice.

name: BARONY_ACH_KNOW_THYSELF
description: Kill a Shadow who is mimicking your identity.

name: BARONY_ACH_SITTING_DUCK
description: Kill 10 enemies while they are paralyzed or ensnared in a single playthrough.

name: BARONY_ACH_NARCISSIST
description: Use a Mirror Shield to kill an enemy using its own reflected spell.

name: BARONY_ACH_THANK_ME_LATER
description: Throw a Healing or Extra Healing potion at another Player or allied NPC.

name: BARONY_ACH_CONFESSOR
description: Dominate an NPC that is already allied to you.

name: BARONY_ACH_THICK_SKULL
description: Kill a Scarab using a magic spell.

name: BARONY_ACH_TEMPT_FATE
description: Eat Tomalley shortly after vomiting.

name: BARONY_ACH_YES_WE_CAN
description: Eat 10 tins of food in a single playthrough.

name: BARONY_ACH_BRING_A_TOWEL
displayName: Don't Forget to Bring a Towel!
description: Use a towel to stop bleeding, clean pie off your face, and wipe grease from your hands.

name: BARONY_ACH_HOT_SHOWER
description: Use a sink or fountain to extinguish flames.

name: BARONY_ACH_CHEERS
description: Throw booze at another character while you are under its effects

name: BARONY_ACH_ARCANE_LINK
description: Gain extra Mana Regeneration from two sources simultaneously.

name: BARONY_ACH_TROLLS_BLOOD
description: Gain extra Health Regeneration from two sources simultaneously.

name: BARONY_ACH_LAST_RESORT
description: Destroy a boulder using Digging or a Pickaxe while it's rolling toward you.

name: BARONY_ACH_REPOSSESSION
description: Pick up an item that an Incubus or Succubus stole from you.

name: BARONY_ACH_RHYTHM_OF_THE_KNIGHT
description: Perform a Block, Attack tradeoff 3 times against a single foe without taking an unblocked hit.

name: BARONY_ACH_THANK_THE_TANK
description: Have an allied player or NPC kill an enemy that you are Blocking.

name: BARONY_ACH_HEAL_BOT
description: Heal 1000 points of Player or Allied NPC hit points in a single playthrough.

name: BARONY_ACH_COCK_BLOCK
description: Block and take no damage against a Cockatrice's melee attack.

name: BARONY_ACH_STFU
description: Throw Sharur into a pit.

name: BARONY_ACH_EARN_THIS
description: Give a Legendary item to an Allied NPC.

name: BARONY_ACH_CHOSEN_ONE
description: Die while equipped with a Legendary item.

name: BARONY_ACH_BUT_A_SCRATCH
description: Defeat a powerful enemy with no more than 5 hit points remaining.

name: BARONY_ACH_LIFE_FOR_A_LIFE
description: Sacrifice your entire health pool to Dominate an enemy and survive it.

name: BARONY_ACH_SPELUNKY
description: Escape the Caves.

name: BARONY_ACH_RECYCLER
description: Give an item to an Allied Automaton to recycle.

name: BARONY_ACH_ONE_WHO_KNOCKS
displayName: I Am the One Who Knocks
description: Tank a minotaur's attack and take no damage from it without blocking.

name: BARONY_ACH_STROBE
description: Exploit the Light spell by casting it 20 times in a single minute.

name: BARONY_ACH_SPONGE
description: Survive 150 damage or more taken from a single attack.

name: BARONY_ACH_ESCORT
description: Return to Hamlet with a human NPC ally.

name: BARONY_ACH_LOCAL_CUSTOMS
description: Start a game with a Workshop or local mod file loaded.

name: BARONY_ACH_CARTOGRAPHER
description: Launch the Barony level editor.

name: BARONY_ACH_ALL_IN_REFLEXES
description: Catch an Insectoid or Goatman's flying thrown weapon.

name: BARONY_ACH_HOT_TUB
description: Gain 50+ Levels of Swimming with Hunger turned off.

name: BARONY_ACH_RHINESTONE_COWBOY
description: Identify 50 pieces of Worthless Glass throughout multiple playthroughs.

name: BARONY_ACH_TOUGH_AS_NAILS
description: Have 50 enemies break their weapons against you throughout multiple playthroughs.

name: BARONY_ACH_UNSTOPPABLE_FORCE
description: Break 50 pieces of enemy armor throughout multiple playthroughs.

name: BARONY_ACH_ANGEL_OF_DEATH
description: Perform a fatal stealth attack on an enemy that is attacking another player or allied NPC.

name: BARONY_ACH_MONSTER_SQUAD
description: Play a game with 3 or more players where everyone is a monster.

name: BARONY_ACH_RICH_ALTER_EGO
description: As a monster, trade 50,000 gold while under the effects of Polymorph across all your games.

name: BARONY_ACH_RIGHT_TO_REFUSE
description: Get chased out of a shop because you're a monster.

name: BARONY_ACH_PITY_FRIEND
description: Recruit a human ally as a monster.

name: BARONY_ACH_SECOND_CHANCE
description: Revive yourself by expending your mana as a skeleton.

name: BARONY_ACH_SQUAD_GHOULS
description: Recruit four ghouls at once as a skeleton.

name: BARONY_ACH_BLEATING_BARON
description: Escape the Citadel playing as a true Goatman of any class.

name: BARONY_ACH_BUCKTOOTH_BARON
description: Escape the Citadel playing as a true Vampire of any class.

name: BARONY_ACH_BOMBSHELL_BARON
description: Escape the Citadel playing as a true Succubus of any class.

name: BARONY_ACH_BONY_BARON
description: Escape the Citadel playing as a true Skeleton of any class

name: BARONY_ACH_DRUNK_POWER
description: Escape the Citadel playing as the Brewer class of any race.

name: BARONY_ACH_TURN_UNDEAD
description: Escape the Citadel playing as the Conjurer class of any race.

name: BARONY_ACH_COMMANDER_CHIEF
description: Escape the Citadel playing as the Mesmer class of any race.

name: BARONY_ACH_POWER_HUNGRY
description: Escape the Citadel playing as the Accursed class of any race.

name: BARONY_ACH_MUSCLE_MEMORY
description: Eat food when polymorphed into a human as a true Skeleton.

name: BARONY_ACH_COMEDIAN
description: Equip Funny Bones' weapon and cloak with no other equipment as a skeleton.

name: BARONY_ACH_MIXOLOGIST
description: Learn all of the base and secondary alchemy ingredients.

name: BARONY_ACH_BOMBARDIER
description: Kill 50 enemies with thrown potions.

name: BARONY_ACH_IRON_GUT
description: Eat 20 tin cans as a true goatman.

name: BARONY_ACH_FAMILY_REUNION
description: Recruit three goatman allies as a true goatman.

name: BARONY_ACH_BOTTLE_NOSED
description: Find extra potions from fountains 20 times as a true goatman.

name: BARONY_ACH_SKELETON_CREW
description: Summon two Skeleton Familiars at once.

name: BARONY_ACH_IN_THE_MIX
description: Brew 50 potions using an Alembic.

name: BARONY_ACH_FREE_REFILLS
description: Fill 50 empty bottles from sinks or fountains.

name: BARONY_ACH_TAKE_THIS_OUTSIDE
description: Knockback 10 monsters into doors.

name: BARONY_ACH_ONE_PUNCH_MAN
description: Paralyze a monster with Legendary Unarmed skill.

name: BARONY_ACH_BLOOD_VESSELS
description: Accumulate 20 vials of blood at one time as a true Vampire.

name: BARONY_ACH_BLOOD_SPORT
description: Assassinate 50 targets while invisible as a true Vampire.

name: BARONY_ACH_YOUNG_BLOOD
description: Recruit a Young Vampire as a vampire.

name: BARONY_ACH_BAD_BLOOD
description: Lifesteal 500 HP from unarmed sneak-attack kills as an Accursed True Vampire.

name: BARONY_ACH_BLOOD_BOIL
description: Discover the effects of water as a true Vampire.

name: BARONY_ACH_STUCK_ON_YOU
description: Have a fountain bless your equipment as a true Succubus.

name: BARONY_ACH_THE_WAY_YOU_LIKE_IT
description: Curse a blessed weapon as a true Succubus.

name: BARONY_ACH_BARFIGHT_CHAMP
description: Punch 50 enemies to death while drunk as a true Goatman.

name: BARONY_ACH_BAD_ROMANCE
description: Recruit two incubi or succubi sumultaneously as a true Succubus.

name: BARONY_ACH_TEMPTRESS
description: Recruit a confused or drunk human as a true Succubus.

name: BARONY_ACH_BAIT_AND_SWITCH
description: Teleport while an enemy is attacking you in melee combat as a true Succubus.

name: BARONY_ACH_BONE_TO_PICK
description: Have a summoned familiar reach level 35.

name: BARONY_ACH_EXTERNAL_BATTERY
description: Relinquish the soul of a summoned familiar while you have zero MP.

name: BARONY_ACH_REVERSE_THIS_CURSE
description: Find a cure for the Accursed class.

name: BARONY_ACH_FUNCTIONAL
description: Cure your hangover 10 times in a single playthrough as a true Goatman.

name: BARONY_ACH_BLOOD_RUNS_CLEAR
description: Reach Legendary Stealth while playing as the Accursed class.

name: BARONY_ACH_BLOOD_IS_THE_LIFE
description: Escape the Citadel as the Accursed class without being cured, and with hunger enabled.

name: BARONY_ACH_POTION_PREPARATION
description: Hold 16 different potions or bottled liquids in your inventory that don't need to be brewed first.

name: BARONY_ACH_VOLATILE
description: Damage multiple enemies with a single brewed unstable potion 20 times.

name: BARONY_ACH_SECRET_WEAPON
description: Kill a lich with a  thrown potion.

name: BARONY_ACH_SURROGATES
description: Allow 50 charmed allies to die in while in your service as a Mesmer.

name: BARONY_ACH_OFF_LIMITS
description: Attempt to charm a monster that cannot be tamed.

name: BARONY_ACH_KILL_COMMAND
description: Have your charmed allies kill 50 enemies.

name: BARONY_ACH_TAKING_WITH
description: Kill an enemy after you are dead using poison, fire, or tinkered traps

name: BARONY_ACH_TELEFRAG
description: Kill an enemy within 1 second of it teleporting

name: BARONY_ACH_FASCIST
description: Consume 50 non-magical book or scrolls as a true Automaton over the course of multiple playthroughs

name: BARONY_ACH_REAL_BOY
description: Recruit a Human ally and shop with a merchant while under the effects of polymorph as a true Automaton

name: BARONY_ACH_OVERCLOCKED
description: Accumulate 10 minutes of playtime with a superheated boiler as a true Automaton

name: BARONY_ACH_TRASH_COMPACTOR
description: Consume 100 scrap as a true Automaton

name: BARONY_ACH_BOILERPLATE_BARON
description: Escape the Citadel as a true Automaton

name: BARONY_ACH_PIMPIN
description: Recruit a total of 6 Succubus, Incubus or Humans as a true Incubus or Succubus

name: BARONY_ACH_BAD_BEAUTIFUL
description: Equip 4 cursed items at once as a true Incubus or Succubus

name: BARONY_ACH_SERIAL_THRILLA
description: Gain 100 mana from Amulets of Strangulation as a true Incubus or Succubus

name: BARONY_ACH_TRADITION
description: Kill 20 enemies that are near a fountain as a true Incubus

name: BARONY_ACH_BAD_BOY_BARON
description: Escape the Citadel as a true Incubus

name: BARONY_ACH_POP_QUIZ
description: Cast 20 different spells from spellbooks as a true Goblin in a single playthrough

name: BARONY_ACH_DYSLEXIA

name: BARONY_ACH_SAVAGE
description: Reach Legendary skill in any melee weapon skill as a true Goblin

name: BARONY_ACH_TRIBE_SUBSCRIBE
description: Recruit 4 Goblins as a true Goblin

name: BARONY_ACH_BAYOU_BARON
description: Escape the Citadel as a true Goblin

name: BARONY_ACH_GASTRIC_BYPASS

name: BARONY_ACH_BOOKWORM

name: BARONY_ACH_FLUTTERSHY
description: Gain access to an otherwise inaccessible area of the level by using Flutter

name: BARONY_ACH_MONARCH
description: Have Insectoid allies kill 20 enemies for you

name: BARONY_ACH_BUGGAR_BARON
description: Escape the Citadel as a true Insectoid

name: BARONY_ACH_TIME_TO_PLAN
description: Achieve the killing blow against a minotaur using machines and / or traps

name: BARONY_ACH_WONDERFUL_TOYS

name: BARONY_ACH_SUPER_SHREDDER
description: Recycle items into 1000 units of Scrap and Essence using Tinkering Toolkits

name: BARONY_ACH_UTILITY_BELT
description: Have one of every crafted Tinkering item in your inventory

name: BARONY_ACH_FIXER_UPPER
description: Repair or Salvage 100 Tinkered traps and machine allies

name: BARONY_ACH_TORCHERER
description: Gain 100 Scrap from salvaging torches

name: BARONY_ACH_LEVITANT_LACKEY
description: Command a Gyrobot to grab an item or interact with a switch that is otherwise inaccessible

name: BARONY_ACH_MANY_PEDI_PALP
description: Kill 50 webbed enemies as a Spider over multiple playthroughs

name: BARONY_ACH_5000_SECOND_RULE
description: Pick up 50 detected food items as a Rat over multiple playthroughs

name: BARONY_ACH_FORUM_TROLL
description: Acquire 3 Troll allies, break 3 walls, and cast Fear on 3 characters as a Troll in a single playthrough

name: BARONY_ACH_SOCIAL_BUTTERFLY
description: Recruit 50 allies while Shapeshifted or Polymorphed as a Shaman over multiple playthroughs

name: BARONY_ACH_ROLL_THE_BONES

name: BARONY_ACH_COWBOY_FROM_HELL
description: Kill 50 enemies with the whip shortly after teleporting them over multiple playthroughs

name: BARONY_ACH_IRONIC_PUNISHMENT
description: Use the whip to disarm a target's melee weapon, pick up the weapon, and use it to kill the same target

name: BARONY_ACH_SELF_FLAGELLATION
description: Have 30 Enemies kill themselves under retaliation from an Inner Demon over multiple playthroughs

name: BARONY_ACH_OHAI_MARK
description: Teleport to and assassinate 20 marked enemies in a single playthrough

name: BARONY_ACH_CHOPPING_BLOCK
description: Kill 50 enemies disabled by slow, sleep or paralyze effects with an axe as a Punisher over multiple playthroughs

name: BARONY_ACH_ITS_A_LIVING
description: Inflict bleeding status on 50 enemies while wearing the executioner's hood over multiple playthroughs

name: BARONY_ACH_ARSENAL
description: Hold a crossbow, bow and all ammo types in your inventory at once as a Hunter

name: BARONY_ACH_IF_YOU_LOVE_SOMETHING
description: Have the Boomerang return to you 100 times after hitting an enemy over multiple playthroughs

name: BARONY_ACH_GUDIPARIAN_BAZI
description: Escape the Citadel without ever hitting an enemy with a melee weapon as a Hunter from the beginning of the game

name: BARONY_ACH_STRUNG_OUT
description: Use swift ammunition while wielding the compound bow to score 10 hits on enemies in a short amount of time

name: BARONY_ACH_FELL_BEAST
description: Do a very large amount of damage to an enemy using a ranged weapon with a single shot

name: BARONY_ACH_PLEASE_HOLD
description: Hit an enemy with Hunting or Fire Ammo, and then stall them with Springshot Ammo

description: Escape the Mines in a cooperative game where a true Incubus and Succubus are in the party

name: BARONY_ACH_MACHINE_HEAD

name: BARONY_ACH_RAGE_AGAINST

name: BARONY_ACH_GUERILLA_RADIO

name: BARONY_ACH_BOMBTRACK

name: BARONY_ACH_DIPLOMA

description: Complete the all Trials with a combined completion time of less than 20 minutes

name: BARONY_ACH_EXTRA_CREDIT
